EmailTemplate.subject: Bitesize Work Experience with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Want some Bitesize Work Experience in Feb half term?
Work alongside The Challenge's staff for half a day to help sign up charity partners to take part in the programme.
You will meet with one of the team who will take you through the meeting and potential outcomes. Learn how to book and run a meeting with a charity or professional partner before signing them up for the programme.
It's a great chance to develop your CV and learn how to work in a professional capacity. The opportunity is only for half a day during half term. The deadline for applications is this Friday. Sign up using the link below:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1z22DIYCs7czFy5pDOe-DCwnsQY6IjiyVEQ92jdMcppQ/viewform
Have a great day,
Liam
